meanings: request to come[to accompany one] to the police station

vlive.korean: [말문 막힘] - 너 제일 좋아한대 - 2명과 동행하고 있는 거야? [No words] - You're their favorite. - You're with them now? 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : [DAMOIM/★선공개★] EP.6 다모임 안의 중2병이 깨어났다…!ㅣ둘도 없는 힙합 친구 : 다모임ㅣDingo Freestyle
vlive.english: [No words] - You're their favorite. - You're with them now?

vlive.korean: 이 파티게 딱 1명과 동행할 수 있다면 누구랑 가고 싶은지? If you can go to the party with one person, who do you want to go with? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] NU'EST X LieV - 뉴이스트의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: If you can go to the party with one person, who do you want to go with?

vlive.korean: 그럼 그분이 같이 동행하셨죠? - 그렇죠 뒤에 그 선생님 계셨죠. Then he was with you right? - Right, teacher was behind me. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 학주켑😀
vlive.english: Then he was with you right? - Right, teacher was behind me.

vlive.korean: 오늘도 같이 촬영 동행해주셔서 너무 감사합니다~ Thank you for filming with us today! 듣기 View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [BNB12&UNB서울패션위크콜라보②] 100%먹히는 디자인PT 방법 공개!!
